   <script type="text/javascript">
    $(window).resize(function(e){
     //setwidth();
     //slideAnimation()
 });
 $(document).ready(function(e){
     $('.sliders').carousel({ pause: "hover", interval: 4000/*, ride:false */ });
     $('.carousel-indicators li').click(function(e){
         e.stopPropagation();
         var goTo = $(this).data('slide-to');
         $('.carousel-inner .item').each(function(index){
             if ($(this).data('id') == goTo){
                 goTo = index;
                 return false;
             }
         });
         $('.sliders').carousel(goTo);
     });
     /*$('.carousel-control').click(function(e){
         e.stopPropagation();
         var goTo = $(this).data('data-slide');
         if (goTo == "prev"){
             $('.sliders').carousel('prev');
         } else {
             $('.sliders').carousel('next');
         }
     });*/
     //setwidth();
     //slideAnimation()
     /* Update Daynemic Page Slide with Navigation */
     //var html = '';
     //html += '<li class="active" data-slide="1">&nbsp;</li>';
     //var dataslidepg = 2;
     //for (var dotsl = 1; dotsl < $('.PageSlideBann').length; dotsl++){
     //    html += '<li data-slide="' + dataslidepg + '">&nbsp;</li>';
     //    dataslidepg++;
     //}
     //$('ul.navigation').html(html);
 
     //$('.navigation').find('li').on('click', function(){
     //    htmlbody.animate({
     //        scrollTop: $('.slide[data-slide="' + $(this).attr('data-slide') + '"]').offset().top //+ 300
     //    }, 1500);
     //});
 
     var PSBtotalHeight = 0;
     $('.PageSlideBann').each(function(index, element){
         var cusheight = $(this).outerHeight(true);
         PSBtotalHeight = parseInt(PSBtotalHeight + cusheight);
     });
     $(window).scroll(function(){
         var height = $(window).height();
         var scrollTop = parseInt($(window).scrollTop());
         //if (scrollTop > parseInt((PSBtotalHeight - ($('.PageSlideBann').height() - 200)))){
         //    $('.navigation').hide();
         //} else {
         //    $('.navigation').show();
         //};
 
         var AnimationPageSlideHT = parseInt((PSBtotalHeight - ($('.PageSlideBann').height())));
         if (scrollTop > AnimationPageSlideHT){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '-700px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '700px' }, 1000);
         }
         if (scrollTop > parseInt(AnimationPageSlideHT + 50)){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '-600px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '600px' }, 1000);
         }
         if (scrollTop > parseInt(AnimationPageSlideHT + 100)){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '-600px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '500px' }, 1000);
         }
         if (scrollTop > parseInt(AnimationPageSlideHT + 150)){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '-500px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '400px' }, 1000);
         }
         if (scrollTop > parseInt(AnimationPageSlideHT + 200)){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '-400px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '300px' }, 1000);
         }
         if (scrollTop > parseInt(AnimationPageSlideHT + 250)){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '-300px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '200px' }, 1000);
         }
         if (scrollTop > parseInt(AnimationPageSlideHT + 300)){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '-200px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '100px' }, 1000);
         }
         if (scrollTop > parseInt(AnimationPageSlideHT + 400)){
             $('.bg1slide').stop().animate({ top: '0px' }, 1000);
             $('.bg2slide').stop().animate({ top: '0px' }, 1000);
         }
     });
 });
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function(){
     $(".more-btn").hover(function(){
         $(".more-link-box").slideToggle("1000");
     });
     $(".search").click(function(){
         $(".input-search").stop().show().animate({ width: '780px', }, 500);
     });
     $(".close-btn").click(function(){
         $(".input-search ").hide().animate({ width: '0px' }, 500);
     });
     if ($(window).width() <= 980){
         $(".search").click(function(){
             $(".input-search").stop().show().animate({ width: '96%', }, 500);
         });
         $(".close-btn").click(function(){
             $(".input-search ").hide().animate({ width: '0px' }, 500);
         });
         $(".mobile-btn-link").click(function(){
             $("#header ul").slideToggle("1000");
         });
         $(".click-mobile").click(function(){
             $(".open-mobile").slideToggle("1000");
         });
         $(".click-mobile-get").click(function(){
             $(".open-mobile-get").slideToggle("1000");
         });
     }
 });
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    function myFunction(){
     var div = $('.new-ChildSider ul li.active');
     var img = $(div).find("img");
     $("[id$=activeChildId]").val($(img).attr("alt"));
     //PageMethods.btnSearch_Click(parseInt($("[id$=activeChildId]").val())); $(div).addClass("active");
     $("[id$=hiddenBtn]").trigger("click");
 }
 function myChildFunction(){
     var div = $('.new-ChildSider ul li.active');
     var img = $(div).find("img");
     $("[id$=HiddenFieldChildID]").val($(img).attr("alt"));
     //PageMethods.btnSearch_Click(parseInt($("[id$=activeChildId]").val()));
     $("[id$=BtnHidden]").trigger("click");
 }
   </script>

          <h1>
           Our Latest Work
          </h1>
          <div class="SliderL" u="slides">
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/21062018044628330school-safety.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Helping Children be Safe During Disasters
            </h2>
            <p>
             More than 3400 students have received School Safety training in the communities we serve in Kolkata.  Through Comprehensive School Safety Framework (CSSF), World Vision India has reached around 26,287 school children in 748 schools on preparedness in 10 States.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/11042018111127965certificate-website-new.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Certificate of Appreciation
            </h2>
            <p>
             World Vision Indias project in Nellore, Andhra Pradesh, received a Certificate of Appreciation from Honble Sri. Amarnatha Reddy for outstanding and remarkable services done throughout the year 2017 and for bringing hope into the lives of vulnerable children.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/18012018092857406ford.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Mobile Clinic to the rescue
            </h2>
            <p>
             Thanks to the Ford Mobile Clinic, Ponamma was saved from a near-death experience. The Mobile Clinic was launched by World Vision India and Ford to provide health services for children and families living in remote locations. More than 18,544 children and adults have benefited through the Mobile Clinic since its launch in 2016.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/09112017043414147HungerFree_WEB.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             A HungerFree India is Possible
            </h2>
            <p>
             India ranks 100 among 119 countries on the Global Hunger Index (GHI) indicating alarming hunger levels. But, we believe a #HungerFree India is possible. Each of us can make a difference. And together, we can make a bigger impact towards curbing malnutrition among children. World Vision India is a proven and dedicated partner in the fight to end hunger and malnutrition even in the hard to reach places. Join us in our fight against hunger and malnutrition
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/15062017050058173Oviya.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Congratulations Oviya!
            </h2>
            <p>
             Oviya has completed her engineering course from Sathyabama, Chennai, and is now placed in a reputed IT firm. A big thank you to Sathyabama University for supporting her studies. Oviya, a lively and cheerful 21-year-old, was World Vision Indias sponsored child.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/05062017052848796thomson.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Green today for kids tomorrow
            </h2>
            <p>
             28 employees from Thomson Reuters provided awareness on hygiene and environment conservation through street plays in the communities we serve in Gundlupet, Karnataka. Papaya and pomegranate saplings were distributed to families and even planted in some households. Tree guards were put up to ensure that saplings grow well and are sustained for the future.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/03052017031320114canah-latestwork.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Our new project
            </h2>
            <p>
             World Vision India along with Unicef India launched the CANAH project for neonatal and maternal health in Bilaspur. Cabinet minister, Mr. Agarwal officially inaugurated the project.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/03052017031234357firesafety-latestwork.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Fire drills
            </h2>
            <p>
             Children and youth from a community we serve in Delhi were trained on fire safety. This community was razed by fire last year. We had provided them with relief and now we are training them to be first responders.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/10022017011152564suraj.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Suraj goes to Germany
            </h2>
            <p>
             Suraj Kumar our sponsored child from the communities we serve in Imphal is among the 15 boys from Manipur selected by the TATA Trusts and U Sports for a premier collaborative football-training programme in Germany. They will be training in Germany for six years and are optimistic in making a mark in the FIFA World Cup 2026.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/09022017055241870Child-Friendly-Space.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Child Friendly Space
            </h2>
            <p>
             A CFS (Child Friendly Space) centre in Bhojpur helped 350 children recover from distress due to the floods last year. The CFS had created an environment where children were absorbed in fun, laughter and games.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/0902201705520563wall-paintings.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Wall Paintings
            </h2>
            <p>
             Walls painting in the communities we serve in Jaipur with child helpline nos, help children and families come forward in reporting cases of abuse and violence.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/09022017055133279digital classroom.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Digital Classrooms
            </h2>
            <p>
             Through the Lions Clubs India and World Vision India education project, 1290 children learn through digital classrooms.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/16062016022725166partnersmeet.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Pune Partners Meet
            </h2>
            <p>
             A Partners Meet was organized in Pune on June 4th. Around 86 sponsors participated in the event. World Vision India makes it a point to connect with sponsors every quarter in different cities. Sponsors are enlightened on the progress of the community and the issues prevalent there.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/16062016020840732drought.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Drought Relief
            </h2>
            <p>
             World Vision India is actively responding to the affected children and families. At present, we are focussing on 12 districts in 6 states viz. Telegana, Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh and Odisha.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/1606201602034612pinkathon.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Pinkathon!
            </h2>
            <p>
             145 women participated on behalf of World Vision India in the marathon organized by Pinkathon on June 5th. The Pinkathon is Indias Biggest Womens Run, created with the specific purpose of getting women to adopt a fitter lifestyle for themselves and their families, and to highlight the need for increased awareness on other issues that put womens lives at risk.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <span class="jssorb08l" style="width:50px;height:50px;top:8px;left:8px;visibility:hidden" u="arrowleft">
          </span>
          <span class="jssorb08r" style="width:50px;height:50px;top:8px;right:-3px" u="arrowright">
          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-6 col-md-6 wrp5 bg2slide">
        <div class="section3">
         <div class="col-xs-11 SliderLWrp2 element4" id="slider2_container" style="top:10px;">
          <!-- Loading Screen -->
          <div class="loading_div" u="loading">
           <div class="loading_div1">
           </div>
           <div class="loading_div2">
           </div>
          </div>
          <h1>
           Stories of change
          </h1>
          <!-- Slides Container -->
          <div class="SliderL" u="slides">
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/21062018043003571suhani.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             The change in Suhani's life
            </h2>
            <p>
             Construction of toilets and Remedial Education Centre in Suhanis village is helping her progress towards a better future. Sponsorship changes lives  in ways you wouldn't have even thought.
             <a href="ChildSponsorship/stories_details2.aspx?code=414">
              READ MORE
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/21062018022418973rubana.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             A confident Rubana
            </h2>
            <p>
             Meet Rubana, a Child Protection Unit(CPU) member. After joining the CPU, Rubana has changed from being quiet to becoming vocal about her rights. Her confidence has soared to a different level.
             <a href="ChildSponsorship/stories_details2.aspx?code=413">
              READ MORE
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/12042018120709295laxmi.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Laxmi is getting better
            </h2>
            <p>
             2-year-old Laxmi was so weak that she could not even stand on her own. Laxmis grandmother brought her to a programme conducted by World Vision India in collaboration with the Jharkhand State Nutrition Mission to treat acute malnutrition among children.
             <a href="ChildSponsorship/stories_details2.aspx?code=408">
              READ MORE
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/15022018045857771handpump.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Empowering Women
            </h2>
            <p>
             If you think it's not a womans job to fix a hand pump? These women will prove you wrong. 53 women from the communities we serve in Unnao, Uttar Pradesh participated in a practical training programme conducted by World Vision India.
             <a href="ChildSponsorship/stories_details2.aspx?code=402">
              READ MORE
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/08022018051149420goats.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             The goats helped Vidhya get better
            </h2>
            <p>
             World Vision India provided Vidhyas family with a pair of goats in 2015 and again in 2016. Before this, her parents were daily wage labourers. But now the family has 22 goats and they make a living by selling the goats. The goat's milk also provides nutrition for Vidhya and her brother Prince
             <a href="ChildSponsorship/stories_details2.aspx?code=400">
              READ MORE
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/18012018084824797self defense.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Heena and Arti learn the art of combat
            </h2>
            <p>
             17-year-old Heena and her 16-year-old friend Arti were among the 250 girls from their neighbourhood who participated in the self-defense classes organised by World Vision India in partnership with the Delhi police. The girls have learned different techniques to escape physical assault and the tools to confront and report harassment.
             <a href="ChildSponsorship/stories_details2.aspx?code=394">
              READ MORE
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/14122017021141950Rithu.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             A Gift of a Medicated Mosquito Net
            </h2>
            <p>
             As three-year-old Ruthi lay sick in her bed, her parents knew something was terribly wrong with their daughter. She had an excruciating headache, a fever, and kept vomiting every now and then. With hours going by, she was almost lying lifeless on her bed.
             <a href="ChildSponsorship/stories_details2.aspx?code=390">
              READ MORE
             </a>
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/21112017023326941Kashish-660.jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Kashish
            </h2>
            <p>
             Kashish stands on a scale to get her weight checked at the anganwadi. The playful 5-year-old was once listless and lethargic. Her personality perked up once she gained weight as her mother Solenka learned to cook more nutritious food at the anganwadi. 
 
 World Vision India supports anganwadis in its programme by identifying and addressing malnutrition among children.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/14112017035824747saraswathi-(660_490).jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Saraswathi
            </h2>
            <p>
             Saraswathi says she is happy to be part of this cooking and feeding programme as she learns and interacts with other mothers. 
 All children are now eating well because of change in the taste.
 Previously I was not aware about the preparation of healthy snacks that can be prepared at home, now I can prepare some items at home because of the learnings that I received through UMANG training, says Saraswathi.
            </p>
           </div>
           <div>
            <img alt="" class="cent" height="" src="CMSAdmin/Uploads/14112017035710389mary(660_490).jpg" width=""/>
            <h2>
             Mary
            </h2>
            <p>
             Marys son 14-month-old Jeevan was identified as a severe acute malnourished child. He was so weak that he could barely walk. After being identified as severly malnourished, World Vision India referred Jeevan to the Nutrition Rehabilitation Centre (NRC). After treatment at the NRC, his family was given a food basket containing all essential, nutritious ingredients. Mary was taught to prepare nutritious meals.
 
 Today, Jeevan has gained weight and is no more a malnourished child. He is normal, his appetite has improved and he is active.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <span class="jssorb08l" style="width:50px;height:50px;top:8px;left:-60px" u="arrowleft">
          </span>
          <span class="jssorb08r" style="width:50px;height:50px;top:8px;right:-50px;visibility:hidden" u="arrowright">
          </span>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    function validateEmail(sender, args){
 	var chkbox = document.getElementById("txtNewsEmail");
 	var uEmail;
 	var temp = document.getElementById("txtNewsEmail");
 	uEmail = temp.value;
 	var re = /\w+([-+.']\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]\w+)*/;
 	if (uEmail == "" || uEmail == "Email"){
 		//alert("Please Enter Email.");
 		$('#alert_placeholderMain').html('<div class="alert alert-danger"><a href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="alert" aria-label="close">&times;</a>Please Enter Email. </div>');
 		args.set_cancel(true);
 	}else if (!re.test(uEmail)){
 		//alert("Please Enter Valid Email.");
 		$('#alert_placeholderMain').html('<div class="alert alert-danger"><a href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="alert" aria-label="close">&times;</a>Please Enter Valid Email. </div>');
 		args.set_cancel(true);
 	}else{
 		args.set_cancel(false);
 	}
 }

 	$('#alert_placeholderMain').html('<div class="alert alert-danger"><a href="#" class="close" data-dismiss="alert" aria-label="close">&times;</a>Are you sure you want close? </div>');

   <script type="text/javascript">
    (function ($){
     $(".eventScroll").niceScroll({ touchbehavior: false, cursorcolor: "#555555", cursoropacitymax: 0.7, cursorwidth: 6, background: "#ccc", autohidemode: false });
 });
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    /*** This javascript file checks for the brower/browser tab action.
 * It is based on the file menstioned by Daniel Melo.
 * Reference: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1921941/close-kill-the-session-when-the-browser-or-tab-is-closed*/
 var validNavigation = false;
 function wireUpEvents(){
 	 /*** For a list of events that triggers onbeforeunload on IE
 	  * check http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms536907(VS.85).aspx
 	  ** onbeforeunload for IE and chrome
 	  * check http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1802930/setting-onbeforeunload-on-body-element-in-chrome-and-ie-using-jquery*/
 	var dont_confirm_leave = 0; //set dont_confirm_leave to 1 when you want the user to be able to leave without confirmation
 	var leave_message = 'You sure you want to leave?'
 	function goodbye(e){
 		debugger
 		if(!validNavigation){
 			if (dont_confirm_leave !== 1){
 				if(!e){
 					e = window.event;
 					//e.cancelBubble is supported by IE - this will kill the bubbling process.
 					e.cancelBubble = true;
 					e.returnValue = leave_message;
 				}
 				//e.stopPropagation works in Firefox.
 				if(e.stopPropagation){
 					e.stopPropagation();
 					e.preventDefault();
 				}
 				//return works for Chrome and Safari
 				return leave_message;
 			}
 		}else{
 			validNavigation = false;
 		}
 	}
 	window.onbeforeunload = goodbye;
 	// window.onbeforeunload = function (){ return false };
 	// Attach the event keypress to exclude the F5 refresh
 	BindEvents();
 }
 function BindEvents(){
 	$(document).bind('keypress', function(e){
 		if (e.keyCode == 116){
 			dontWarn();
 		}
 	});
 	// Attach the event click for all links in the page
 	$("a").bind("click", function(){
 		dontWarn();
 	});
 
 	// Attach the event submit for all forms in the page
 	// $("form").bind("submit", function (){
 	// validNavigation = true;
 	//});
 	// Attach the event click for all inputs in the page
 	$("input[type=submit]").bind("click", function(){
 		 dontWarn();
 	});
 	// Attach the event click for all inputs in the page
 	$("button[type=button]").bind("click", function(){
 		 dontWarn();
 	});
 }
 function dontWarn(){
 	// Don't warn
 	debugger
 	validNavigation = true;
 	// ...but if we're still on the page a second later, set the flag again
 }
 // Wire up the events as soon as the DOM tree is ready
 $(document).ready(function(){
 	//alert("");
 	//wireUpEvents();
 });
 $(document).ready(function (){
     $(window).scroll(function (){
         if ($(this).scrollTop() > 50){ $('#back-to-top').fadeIn(); }
         else { $('#back-to-top').fadeOut(); }
     });
     $('#back-to-top').click(function (){
         $('#back-to-top').tooltip('hide');
         $('body,html').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 800);
         return false;
     });
     var windwidth = $(window).width();
     if (windwidth >= 800){
         $(".NewsSlide .item").addClass("block"); $(".arrowcontrol").addClass("dnone");
     } else {
         $(".NewsSlide .item").addClass("dnone"); $(".arrowcontrol").addClass("block");
     }
 });
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    (function (){
     'use strict'; if (navigator.userAgent.match(/IEMobile\/10\.0/)){
         var msViewportStyle = document.createElement('style')
         msViewportStyle.appendChild(document.createTextNode('@-ms-viewport{width:auto!important}'))
         document.querySelector('head').appendChild(msViewportStyle)
     }
 })();
   </script>
  </body>
 </html>
